name: Brie is Missing
description:
Brie Evans has been missing for 8 years. The case has gone cold and law enforcement doesn’t have any more leads. Desperate to find answers, her dad sneaks into the apartment of one of her old boyfriends. The only clues he has are snippets of an old police interrogation. Determined to find closure, Brie’s dad is willing to do what it takes to get justice.

This game was made in 7 days for the 2020 Epic Mega Jam. No assets were previously made before the jam. I was the sole developer and creator. The story is a complete work of fiction.

**Spoilers**
Below are the solutions to each puzzle.
1218 - Christmas party date.
2306 - Basketball game high score
1395 - Coffee shop price
0451 - 0 enemies, 4 friends, 5 pets, 1 boyfriend (Easter egg code)
0601 - Proposal date
